## Discussion Materials

Similar to [last week's section](https://samanthacsik.github.io/EDS-240-data-viz/course-materials/week7.html#discussion-materials), we'll be discussing progress on our data visualizations and providing constructive feedback to one another. Please plan to bring the following to discussion:

- **one** of your two remaining visualizations (i.e. not the one you brought to section last week)
- the question that you're trying to answer

Add your visualization and your question to the appropriate Google slide deck (each slide is labeled with a name) before section begins:

- [10am section slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1yMazygIdqDcR2J4wlPmPZ9ao40kHE9QmXHFgK7LTNbY/edit?usp=sharing)
- [11am section slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Y4Tf6j4ub8cU9hqp61J1sa31hQidlkIIPhvXVjuZNhU/edit?usp=sharing)

You should be prepared to discuss your design choices and receive constructive feedback from your peers. Be sure to review [the tips](https://samanthacsik.github.io/EDS-240-data-viz/course-materials/week7.html#how-to-give-receive-feedback) on how to give, receive, and  implement feedback.
